name: Loopholes
description:
Summary:

A third person shooter where you play as an Anti-Virus agent trying to exterminate the viruses that have destabilized the network by exploiting the "loopholes" in the network security. Fighting the viruses can be challenging because every time you kill a virus, they start to spread even more.

Objective:

Your goal is to stabilize the entire network by fixing the loopholes in all of the sectors.

Developed for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1
